functions.tag: {skill:{trigger:'shift',id:2s,sid:'turbulent_armor',anchor:1b},raw_json:{content:'["",{"text": "I","font":"island"}," ",{"score":{"name": "@s","objective": "turb.c.skill"},"color":"yellow"}]',Slot:['chest']},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Amount:9d,Slot:'chest',Name:'generic.armor',UUID:[I;-1211021,6073,105744,-12146]},{AttributeName:'generic.armor_toughness',Amount:2.5d,Slot:'chest',Name:'generic.armor_toughness',UUID:[I;-1211021,6173,105744,-12346]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"汹涌之甲","italic":false,"bold":true,"color":"dark_purple"}]',Lore:['{"text":"史诗","bold":true,"color":"dark_purple"}','""','{"text":"这副胸甲藏在热带草原侧岛上的","italic":false,"color":"#ccff99"}','{"text":"墓碑里，唯有捐献贡品，才可以","italic":false,"color":"#ccff99"}','{"text":"得到这无穷力量的圣甲。","italic":false,"color":"#ccff99"}','""','{"text":"装备属性：","italic":false,"color":"dark_green"}','{"text":"+9 盔甲","italic":false,"color":"dark_green"}','{"text":"+2.5 盔甲韧性","italic":false,"color":"dark_green"}','""','{"text":"技能：“脂”肪为甲","italic":false,"color":"dark_aqua","bold":true}','[{"text":"手持并连按两下","color": "white","bold": true,"italic": false},{"keybind":"key.sneak"},"触发"]','[{"text":"瞬间回复自身","color":"dark_aqua","bold":false,"italic":false},{"text":"8点生命值","color":"light_purple"}]','[{"text":"但同时由于盔甲的巨大力量","color":"dark_aqua","bold":false}]','[{"text":"你的饥饿值随后会","italic":false,"color":"dark_aqua"},{"text":"快速下降","italic":false,"color":"light_purple","bold":true}]','[{"text":"冷却：2分钟","color":"yellow"}]']},HideFlags:2}
